Tightening or torquing procedure for reinstalling Conmet wheel bearing preload systems.

svcproc.title: Service procedure

warning.para: To avoid personal injury or death, shift transmission to neutral or park, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.

svcproc.para: The Conmet home page (http://www.conmet.com) gives specific instructions for removal, inspection and installation of their preset bearing load assemblies. Should you elect to discard the bearing adjustment spacer and go back to the conventional bearing adjustment procedure, go to their web page, click on literature on the left side of the page, and pull up (FAQ) frequently asked questions. This section will address what to do if you want to discard the spacer and use standard wheel bearings and conventional adjusting procedures.
